Translations.Text: A L. R. These (list) bol proofs this profound scripture
My revealed it Arabic Quran ona chapat
My narrate ona the vela accurate history revelation z this Quran. Before this ona bol totally unaware
Recall lenze Joseph said do jeho otca O moj otca ja saw 11 planets sun moon ja saw them prostrating mna
He said Moj syn nie tell tvoj brat tvoj dream lest they zapletka kut plany ona. Iste devil je clovek zly enemy
Tvoj Lord thus zehnat ona dat ona dobry zvest tvoj dream He zdokonalit Jeho blessings ona rodina Jacob mat rad He robit for tvoj predok Abraham Isaac before ze. Tvoj Lord bol Omniscient Wise
